title: Perceptiven't

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you receive a whisper from any player during the day, you may choose to target that player with your night action in addition to your original target. You can have any number of targets this way.
- Players killed by you appear to have been killed by an 866: Perceptive.

desc:
Post 2739
*This taste... is the taste of Tooru Saesen!*
